content:
Maybe when we have more different tools in the future,
we'll be able to catch butterflies and bugs in the grass.

Me? I'm observing the nearby bushes, (smiling)
Perhaps among the wild grass
I'll discover more "neighbors"!

<color=#ca8f50>{me}</color>,
I've seen you running around gathering materials. You must be tired.
Setting up a new home always comes with a lot of preparation.
